java.beans

Class ThreadGroupContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.beans.ThreadGroupContext

  • final class ThreadGroupContext
extends Object
    The ThreadGroupContext is an application-dependent context referenced by the specific ThreadGroup. This is a replacement for the AppContext.
    Author:
    Sergey Malenkov
